content.text:
[@ev](@8Qee0I/DwI5DHSCi3p5fsl6FyLGArrnDz3ox9qZr5Qc=.ed25519) 

I've just pushed a change so you can run `node delete-views.js` and it'll delete all of the files in `~/.ssb/flume` that don't start with "log". I've only tested it once, but it worked for me. As you mentioned, having a backup is a *great* idea. The code and readme are pretty messy right now, so I'd be happy to hear/receive any suggestions/PRs on how to improve it.
